程序包的使用
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking

使用org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking的程序包
程序包 说明
org.janusgraph.diskstorage  
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking  
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking.consistentkey  
  • org.janusgraph.diskstorage使用的org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking中的类
    类 说明
    Locker
    Threadsafe discretionary locking within and between processes JanusGraph.
    LockerProvider  
  • org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking使用的org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking中的类
    类 说明
    AbstractLocker.Builder
    Abstract builder for this Locker implementation.
    LocalLockMediator
    This class resolves lock contention between two transactions on the same JVM.
    LocalLockMediatorProvider
    Service provider interface for LocalLockMediators.
    LocalLockMediators
    A singleton maintaining a globally unique map of LocalLockMediator instances.
    Locker
    Threadsafe discretionary locking within and between processes JanusGraph.
    LockerState
    A store for LockStatus objects.
    LockStatus
    A single held lock's expiration time.
    PermanentLockingException
    This exception signifies a failure to lock based on durable state.
    TemporaryLockingException
    This exception signifies a (potentially) temporary exception while attempting to acquire a lock in the JanusGraph storage backend.
  • org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking.consistentkey使用的org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking中的类
    类 说明
    AbstractLocker
    Abstract base class for building lockers.
    AbstractLocker.Builder
    Abstract builder for this Locker implementation.
    LocalLockMediator
    This class resolves lock contention between two transactions on the same JVM.
    Locker
    Threadsafe discretionary locking within and between processes JanusGraph.
    LockerProvider  
    LockStatus
    A single held lock's expiration time.
    TemporaryLockingException
    This exception signifies a (potentially) temporary exception while attempting to acquire a lock in the JanusGraph storage backend.
